Job Title: Strategic Sourcing Consultant

Location: San Francisco Bay Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Human Resources, Information Technology

Description:
Job TitleIndirect Strategic Sourcing Consultant
Must Have skills:ProcurementRetail Industry
Detailed Job DescriptionYour role as a Strategic Sourcing Consultant:
As a Strategic Sourcing Consultant, you will be responsible for developing strong and effective business partner relationships and providing strategic sourcing support to the assigned category. Reporting to the Director of Strategic Sourcing, you will leverage your experience to deliver significant value to key stakeholders by managing the end-to-end strategic sourcing process including sourcing events and contracting to drive savings for your primary spend category and associated sub-categories.
In addition, you will:• Conduct all phases in the development of complex contracts, including reviewing statements of work or requirements, request for information (RFI), and request for proposal (RFP) development• Partner with a broad mix of stakeholders on contract evaluation, redlining, and negotiation, such as Legal, Privacy, Information Security, and Internal Controls• Continually improve supplier performance by setting measurable, contractual, performance targets and related supplier performance management• Stay abreast of changes in the market, such as emerging technologies and suppliers, and evaluate and address any impact of changes in supplier status (eg, via acquisition)• Identify and evaluate diverse suppliers, with a goal of increasing the percentage of category spend with diverse suppliers• Advocate for and track compliance to Indirect Spend and Delegation of Authority policies • Strategize across categories/departments to identify opportunities for gained efficiencies and cost-effectiveness in supplier negotiations• Build project plans and timelines to ensure key milestones are being captured and met as it relates to assigned sourcing and contracting projects• Close sourcing projects in a timely manner, including but not limited to uploading executed agreements to our contract lifecycle management, and security stakeholder and finance approval on savings or cost avoidance• Effectively communicate status updates to key stakeholders, including timely identification and escalation/resolution of issues• Bring best practices in Strategic Sourcing and Indirect Procurement to drive automation and simplification.• Participate actively to improve Sustainability, Supplier Diversity, and 3rd party Risk goals.• Demonstrate values of Passion for Client Service, Innovation, Expertise, Balance, Respect for All, Teamwork, and Initiative. 
We’re excited about you if you have:• 5+ years of strategic sourcing experience, with strong expertise in multiple technology product and service categories in a multi-national retail corporation• Experience in sourcing multiple key categories.• Excellent prioritization skills with the ability to adapt and change quickly.• A continuous learning mindset• A proven track record of cost reduction and productivity improvements.• Ability to influence and drive change while building solid relationships with your internal clients and external suppliers.• Excellent project and timeline management skills to manage sourcing projects end-to-end, from project intake, through onboarding to project closure and transition.• Excellent interpersonal skills with the ability to prioritize and multi-task in a fast-paced environment.• Experience and skill as a negotiator with the utilization of flexible strategies.• Ability to successfully influence both internal and external partners.• Excellent communication skills, including oral, written, and interpersonal. Experience interfacing with senior-level stakeholders.• Advanced analytics, excel, presentation, data visualization, and Sourcing tools skills (required)
You’ll love working here because:• The manifesto. We believe in championing all beauty, living with courage, and standing fearlessly together to celebrate our differences. We will never stop building a community where diversity is expected, self-expression is honored, all are welcomed, and you are included. We belong to something beautiful.• The people. You will be surrounded by some of the most talented, supportive, smart, and kind leaders and teams – people you can be proud to work with.• The product. Employees enjoy a product discount and receive free product (“gratis”) various times throughout the year. (Think your friends and family love you now? Just wait until you work here!)• The business. It feels good to win – and we are a leader in the retail industry, defining experiential retail with a digital focus and creating the most loved beauty community in the world…with the awards and accolades to back it up.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
